summary: This is a mod that change Hjaalmarch.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][I][COLOR=#8DB3E2][FONT=Courier][B][SIZE=7][U]Hjaalmarch Redone[/U][/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/I]

[FONT=Verdana][B][COLOR=#CCC1D9][SIZE=3]This mod change Hjaalmarch so it looks alittle more deserted and dead than vanilla.
theres a mod that do this but not exactly the same, i have only removed all the pinetrees because i didnt like them so much in that area. The other mod i was mentioned was Hjaalmarch Redux, i actually like that but i didnt get any response from the author so i made my own version of hjaalmarch.[/FONT][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[FONT=Verdana][B][COLOR=#CCC1D9][SIZE=3]If you like it dont forget to endorse and ofc comment thank you![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[COLOR=#7F7F7F][SIZE=7][I][B]___________________________________[/B][/I][/SIZE][/COLOR][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#FFC000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=1][U][I][B]THERE ARE 4 DIFFERENT MAIN FILES, DOWNLOAD AND USE ONLY ONE![/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=2][U][I][B]THERE ARE 4 DIFFERENT MAIN FILES, DOWNLOAD AND USE ONLY ONE![/B][/I][/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[/COLOR]

[FONT=Verdana][B][COLOR=#CCC1D9][SIZE=3]Updated Skyrim to latest is recommended.
The mod is not compatible with anything that modifies the same things.[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]
[COLOR=#7F7F7F][SIZE=7][I][B]___________________________________[/B][/I][/SIZE][/COLOR][/COLOR]
